amendment.description: Amendment makes various changes in the bill including a funding increase for F-22 testing, allowing the use of DOD resources for public safety and security at the 2002 Winter Olympics in Salt Lake City, and permitting the Secretary of Defense to accept monetary contributions for the purpose of reconstructing the Pentagon.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 107-218. The amendment is in the form of a manager's amendment and provides for sundry additions and changes in the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stump amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
